content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals this darling kitten is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * skill level easy 2 colors 1 ball each wool-ease® article #620 or vanna s choice® article #860 *ed note very small amount of contrast color used for tail* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing scrap of pink yarn some construction required to finish available in different versions 2005 wool-ease® article #620 *black white/multi* published in knit 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-amigurumi-cat-3 2008 vanna s choice® article #860 *black white* published in michael s create https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-amigurumi-cat-2
